sentences.sContent: I don't know the philology side, I don't know what disables to metaphysical questions.
sentences.sContent_eng: I don't know the philology side, I don't know what disables to metaphysical questions.
sentences.sCn: 我不知道者从语言学上来说对不对，我也不懂从形而上学角度看,有什么问题。

trans.tranOther: the study of words and of the way words and languages develop
